TableInfo.QueryValue: UPDATE EMAILLOG SET STATUS = 'E', NOTE = :NOTE WHERE AUTOID = :AUTOID

SELECT A.TEMPLATE_ID, A.NEXT_RUN_DATE, B.LAST_START_DATE FROM TEMPLATES_SCHEDULER A, (SELECT TEMPLATE_ID, MAX(LOG_DATE) LAST_START_DATE FROM TEMPLATES_SCHEDULER_LOG GROUP BY TEMPLATE_ID) B WHERE A.TEMPLATE_ID = B.TEMPLATE_ID(+) AND NEXT_RUN_DATE <= GETCURRDATE AND A.NEXT_RUN_DATE > NVL(B.LAST_START_DATE, TO_DATE('01/01/2012','DD/MM/RRRR'))
SELECT REPORT_ID FROM ATTACHMENTS WHERE ATTACHMENT_ID = :ATTACHMENT_ID
INSERT INTO TEMPLATES_STATUS(CODE, BCHDATE, START_TIME) VALUES(:CODE, CSPKS_SYSTEM.FN_GET_SYSVAR('SYSTEM','CURRDATE'), SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO TEMPLATES_STATUS(CODE, BCHDATE, START_TIME) VALUES(:CODE, CSPKS_SYSTEM.FN_GET_SYSVAR('SYSTEM','CURRDATE'), SYSDATE)
SELECT C.CUSTODYCD, A.AFACCTNO, C.FULLNAME, NVL(AF.EMAIL, C.EMAIL) EMAIL FROM AFTEMPLATES A, CFMAST C, AFMAST AF WHERE AF.CUSTID = C.CUSTID AND A.AFACCTNO = AF.ACCTNO AND A.TEMPLATE_CODE = :CODE
SELECT * FROM AFTEMPLATES WHERE AFACCTNO = :ACCTNO AND TEMPLATE_CODE = :CODE

SELECT * FROM (SELECT T.PRIORITY, EMAIL, EMAILCC, T.CODE, T.NAME, T.SUBJECT, T.FORMAT, E.DATASOURCE, E.AUTOID, T.TYPE, T.REQUIRE_REGISTER, T.EXPORT_PATH, T.ALLOW_ZIP, E.AFACCTNO, LISTAGG(A.REPORT_ID, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY A.REPORT_ID) AS REPORTS, T.CYCLE FROM emaillog E, TEMPLATES T, ATTACHMENTS A WHERE E.TEMPLATEID = T.CODE AND T.CODE = A.ATTACHMENT_ID(+) AND STATUS = 'A' GROUP BY EMAIL, EMAILCC, CODE, NAME, SUBJECT, FORMAT, E.DATASOURCE, REQUIRE_REGISTER, EXPORT_PATH, E.AUTOID, ALLOW_ZIP, T.TYPE, E.AFACCTNO, T.CYCLE, T.PRIORITY ) WHERE ROWNUM <=20 ORDER BY PRIORITY, AUTOID
UPDATE EMAILLOG SET STATUS = 'S', SENTTIME = SYSDATE WHERE AUTOID = :AUTOID AND STATUS = 'A'
UPDATE EMAILLOG SET STATUS = 'R' WHERE AUTOID = :AUTOID AND STATUS = 'A'
UPDATE SMSMATCHED SET STATUS = 'S', SENTDATE=SYSDATE WHERE AUTOID <= :AUTOID AND CUSTODYCD = :CUSTODYCD AND STATUS = 'N'
SELECT FLDNAME, DATATYPE, DEFVAL FROM RPTFIELDS WHERE OBJNAME = :RPTID AND ISPARAM = 'Y' ORDER BY ODRNUM
SELECT VARVALUE FROM SYSVAR WHERE GRNAME = :GRNAME AND VARNAME = :VARNAME
SELECT VARVALUE FROM SYSVAR WHERE GRNAME = 'SYSTEM' AND VARNAME IN ('HEADOFFICE','BRNAME','BRADDRESS',')
UPDATE LOG_NOTIFY_EVENT SET STATUS = 'E', APPLYTIME = SYSDATE WHERE AUTOID = :AUTOID
SELECT * FROM LOG_NOTIFY_EVENT WHERE STATUS = 'A' ORDER BY AUTOID
NMPKS_EMS.GenTemplates
NMPKS_EMS.GenNotifyEvent

SELECT VARNAME KEY, VARVALUE VALUE FROM SYSVAR WHERE GRNAME = 'SYSTEM' AND VARNAME IN ('HEADOFFICE','BRNAME','BRADDRESS','BRPHONEFAX','RPTTITLE','COMPANYNAME','CURRDATE') UNION SELECT 'CREATED_BY' KEY, T.TLNAME VALUE FROM TLPROFILES T WHERE TLID=:TLID UNION SELECT 'REPORT_TITLE' KEY, T.DESCRIPTION VALUE FROM RPTMASTER T WHERE RPTID=:RPTID
SELECT L.AUTOID, L.EMAILCUSTOMER, E.EMAILID, E.SUBJECT, E.ATTACHMENT, E.BODYHTML FROM EMAILPOPLOG L, EMAILPOPULAR E WHERE L.PROCESS ='N' AND L.EMAILID = E.EMAILID
UPDATE EMAILPOPLOG SET PROCESS = 'Y', STATUS = :STATUS, SENTTIME = SYSDATE WHERE AUTOID = :AUTOID
